name: MathUtils
description: MathUtils library. A library to be used in conjunction with SafeMath. Contains functions for calculating differences between two uint256.

functionDecorators.name: difference
functionDecorators.description: Calculates absolute difference between a and b.

functionDecorators.name: within1
functionDecorators.description: Compares a and b and returns true if the difference between a and b is less than 1 or equal to each other.

returnDecorators.description: True if the difference between a and b is less than 1 or equal, otherwise return false.
